forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 34. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 51, with temperatures falling to around 45 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As night gently settles over Boston, the air remains crisp and clear, with temperatures dipping to a refreshing 34 degrees. The stillness is punctuated only by the soft rustle of leaves as a gentle northwesterly breeze whispers through the streets. The darkness blankets the city, casting it in a tantalizing mystery highlighted by the twinkling lights of the skyline, a reminder of the vibrant life that pulses through this historic urban landscape.

Come morning, the promise of a sunlit day awaits. As dawn breaks, wreathed in golden hues, expect a cheerful embrace of clear skies. The temperatures will gradually rise to a pleasant 51 degrees, then taper off into the afternoon. This day beckons for light layers—perhaps a cozy sweater worn over a simple long-sleeve shirt—perfect for a stroll through the quiet corners of the Commons or a leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café. While the chill may make one yearn for warmth, the sunshine will offer a tender reassurance, encouraging reflective moments amidst the warmth of day. Whether one chooses a brisk walk along the Charles or a leisurely read in a sun-dappled park, this day holds the potential for quiet pleasures that resonate in the heart of Boston.
